title: NIEPMD Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for Senior Consultant Posts
description: The National Institute for Empowerment of Persons with Multiple Disabilities (NIEPDM) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Senior Consultant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation can apply for the NIEPMD Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education d...
